Distractions during training sessions: If the training sessions are conducted in a noisy or distracting environment, the dog may not be able to focus and learn the desired behaviors.
Inconsistent training techniques: If the trainer uses different training methods and techniques, the dog may become confused and unable to learn the desired behaviors.
Inadequate socialization: If the dog is not properly socialized, it may not be able to handle the stress and pressure of the dog show environment, leading to behavioral issues.
Poor health: If the dog is not in good health, it may not be able to participate in the dog show, or it may not perform to its full potential due to lack of energy or discomfort.
Incorrect nutrition: If the dog is not fed a proper diet, it may not have the energy or nutrients needed to perform at its best during the dog show.
